names.english: white atractylodes and aconite accessory root decoction
names.commonEnglish: White Atractylodes and Aconite Accessory Root Decoction

actions: Tonifies the Spleen, augments Qi, dries Dampness and promotes water metabolism.
Disperses Cold and Dampness, warms the channels and stops pain.
With Bai Zhu, for Wind-Damp Bi and Spleen Yang Deficiency with a cold, painful abdomen, vomiting and watery diarrhea.
Releases the Exterior, induces perspiration, disperses Cold, warms the Middle and normalizes the flow of Qi at the center.
Tonifies the Spleen, augments Qi, moderates spasms, alleviates pain, moderates and harmonizes the harsh properties of other herbs and guides the herbs to all twelve channels.
Tonifies the Spleen and Stomach and augments Qi.
With Sheng Jiang , for External Wind-Cold.

symptoms: The pain is intense and moves around
Joints are warm to the touch (may be burning and swollen)
The pain is worse at night
Joint degeneration or deformity in the lumbar region
Heaviness of the body and limbs
manifestations.tongueCoat: White and greasy or Thin, yellow and greasy

contraindications: Contraindicated for those with hard stools due to Heat or Yin Deficiency.

modifications.purpose: Wind-Damp Bi with numbness and loss of movement in the joints
